response.explain: The previous subtasks were only checking if the mattress and pillow are on the bed, but they didn't include any actions to actually put them on the bed. The task goal is to put a mattress on the bed and put a pillow on it. From the observed relations, we can see that the mattress is already inside the bed and the pillow is on top of the bed. Therefore, no further actions are needed.
response.subtask:
(1) Check if the mattress is on the bed.
(2) Check if the pillow is on the bed.
response.code: # No code needed as the subtasks are already completed
